recipe_name: Stir-fried beansprouts with peppers and herbs
author: Paul Rankin
method: Heat the olive oil in a wok or large frying pan, add the onion and red pepper and stir fry for 3-4 minutes until softened. Add the garlic and cook for one minute, then add the beansprouts and cook for a further minute. Add the herbs, season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper and stir. To serve, place into a serving dish.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, sliced,  ¼ red pepper, chopped,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped,  150g/5½oz beansprouts,  1 tbsp chopped fresh dill,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
